title: Blitz buff and Tresh nerf was unreasonable
body: Item reworks and bugfixes were mostly nice, but this is just unreasonable, Blitz is already a very strong pick in low/medium elos, and Tresh now falls away from 100-200 late game shield without any reason. Did riot guys even check win rates/plays/stats on them?

replies.body: We've got pretty different interpretations of the changes . We see the Blitz changes as nerfs overall (he's too strong overall, not just at lower Elos) and the Thresh changes as a buff (Shield now scales with Souls collected directly, rather than with the AP Souls offer).

> [{quoted}](name=Meddler,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=5MGTEWwf,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-06-29T02:06:00.525+0000)

> We've got pretty different interpretations of the changes . We see the Blitz changes as nerfs overall (he's too strong overall, not just at lower Elos) and the Thresh changes as a buff (Shield now scales with Souls collected directly, rather than with the AP Souls offer).

I think I see what you mean, here. The souls used to interact with the shield by giving it bonus AP, and the shield scaled off of AP. Now, the souls will "directly" buff the shield by, say, causing each soul he has to give it a better value. Please confirm, but if not and you're too busy, I understand. :D
Yes, this is what he means. It's also a buff because the value souls gave to the shield was never 1.

it was 40% ap. In late game you can easily get 3-600 ap, but souls hardly get over 200 even with new buff. considering this tresh probably going to lcs very soon again i am afraid they are going to buff then nerf him.
You don't build AP Thresh, it's horrible.

.75 AP per soul * .4 AP on the sheild does not come close to matching the 1:1 ratio on shield.

Also, if you built AP thresh... I have no words.
Didn't the soul AP have diminishing returns?

It used to. On release thresh received 1 AP and Armor for the first soul, scaling down to about .5 AP and Armor at 100 Souls and then even lower from there. 

Now Thresh gets 0.75 AP and Armor per soul regardless of how many he's collected.
which makes the soul scaling shield even stronger, but I don't believe it actually does.

Speaking of the Thresh changes, now that you've got a damage buff based on Souls with E and a defensive buff based on souls with W, can you just remove the free AP from soul collection?

It's pretty invisible power at this point, since it just straight buffs the damage on his Q and R as well in odd ways. It also changes his damage to turrets to magic because his AP can get up to over where his AD might be, right? That's not intended, is it?

Its overall a nerf as tresh benefits a lot from baron, fire dragon, masteries, and semi-ap items along with souls, making major part of his defending power fall out like this in long games, And with junglers spawn time even with all the monstersouls taken he won't get back that fall out. Having it scale with his passive directly is nice, but without ap ratio its a major late game nerf.
Give back (even if not the full) ap ratio if you want to make him more buffed (i don' know why though, he had fine ratios before this patch)

Reducing Blitz ulti cd on early so he can't wave clear with it every sec was really on spot and looooooooong needed, but with 20 cd on late game with his current ratios (often hits over 700 coming from a tank with 0 ap or special focus on damage)  and its silence and that size of area its just game breaking, and with 5- sec (!) power first on a spell with 1 sec knock-up enemy can't even run away. He can now engage and win even without Q, simply just W+E. ( 2.25 sec cd with 45%cd, not to mention thunderlord is already the most picked mastery for him).

If you want to nerf Blitz please nerf his R damage and revert these cd changes, because like this ~~he willl be~~ is the most picked, and strongest supp, with high mobility, shield, tonns of cc (2 second broken in 3 piece, highest cc on lowest cd spell), damage, and tankiness.
If you go overboard with nerfs after that you can still buff his E damage, or make it have an aoe nearby it, or make it proc the passives damage, or make it reduce armor on target.

It's simple and could solve so many problem.

So if you were building Thresh AP, sorry man.  Riot doesn't generally balance for way-off-meta builds.  For the great, great majority of Thresh players, the shield change is a substantial buff.  

For Blitz, lane Blitz was pretty well trashed, since for the majority of the game, you can't use R to waveclear anymore.  The cd's just too high for that now.  By the time the game is just in teamfight mode (for the small percentage of games where the support get to level 16), and the level 3 R actually comes about, it doesn't really matter in the teamfights since they so rarely last 12-15 seconds.  But seriously, he's nerfed for 100% of most games and 80-90% of the games when he gets to level 16.  That's a huge net nerf.

Also, you're misreading what they did with Blitz's E.  it's 'duration' was what was lowered, not its cooldown.  That's how long you have to use the enhanced AA before it's too late and the skill goes on cooldown.  It gives him less time to use it not more (though honestly, it's a QoL buff if you ask me, I want that thing to reset sooner if I don't have a target in 5 seconds).  But the CD hasn't changed.

Thanks for the Blitz E {{summoner:13}}, though i'd disagree about 80%of games being so short blitz can't even get 16, and his W along with 20- sec cd aoe R on a tank makes him a safe spitpusher despite being a tank-support.
